comments:
Found this NPE in console using GEF-ALL-I20050526.zip, with WTP. 
I think the fundamental problem is ours (we changed how we package some 
things, so suspect some icon/image or something is null) .. but ... 
thought I'd report so you could be sure to be bullet proof. 


ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-06-03 16:50:24.635
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.gef.ui.palette.customize.PaletteCustomizerDialog.close(PaletteCustomizerDialog.java:231)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog.okPressed(Dialog.java:856)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog.buttonPressed(Dialog.java:409)
	at
org.eclipse.gef.ui.palette.customize.PaletteCustomizerDialog.buttonPressed(PaletteCustomizerDialog.java:180)
	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog$2.widgetSelected(Dialog.java:556)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:89)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:844)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:2929)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:2562)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.runEventLoop(Window.java:809)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.open(Window.java:787)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.snippets.internal.palette.SnippetCustomizerDialog.open(SnippetCustomizerDialog.java:216)
	at org.eclipse.gef.ui.palette.CustomizeAction.run(CustomizeAction.java:56)

PaletteCustomizerDialog line 231 is:

actions.clear();
where actions is a list of the actions that you see on the outline toolbar and 
the context menu.

Did the dialog come up properly before you closed it?  Are you creating a 
customized dialog?  

I'll add null checks regardless.

Yes, we do have a custom dialog ... Nitin could tell you more ... everything
actually seemed to work fine ... thought I didn't dig too deep.
